stories.headline: Data services at NICAR
stories.summary: NICAR is expanding its data transfer services, offering conversions and access to a variety of government databases for journalists.

stories.headline: Canadian FOI structure threatens CAR
stories.summary: Challenges in accessing government records electronically in Canada pose a risk to the progress of computer-assisted reporting.

stories.headline: CAR Trek: Oct. 6-9, 1994
stories.summary: The CAR Trek conference aims to gather computer-assisted reporting experts to share their experiences and offer training.

stories.headline: The state of CAR at a small newspaper
stories.summary: A report on the challenges faced by small newspapers in implementing computer-assisted reporting due to lack of resources.

stories.headline: Choosing the right computer
stories.summary: Guidance for news organizations looking to invest in computer hardware for effective CAR work, focusing on speed and storage.

stories.headline: Begging for records in Pennsylvania
stories.summary: A creative approach of requesting campaign finance reports on diskette to simplify data processing for political contributions.
